Attacks.Name: Pound
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Jigglypuff gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Disarming Voice
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target suffers -1 defense die on its next defense roll.

Attacks.Name: Sing
Attacks.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 2. The target gains the Stun special condition. If a wild is rolled, the target also gains the Stagger condition.

Superpowers.Name: Cute Charm
Superpowers.Effect: When an enemy character targets Jigglypuff with a physical attack and rolls a wild, the attacking character gains the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Rollout
Superpowers.Effect: Place Jigglypuff within Range 3. After placement, enemy characters within Range 1 of Jigglypuff suffer 1 damage.

Attacks.Name: Dazzling Gleam
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, enemy characters within Range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Healing Song
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 1 damage from Jigglypuff and all allied characters within Range 2.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Wigglytuff character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
